org.zoolu.tools
Class Assert

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.zoolu.tools.Assert
public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object

Class Assert provides some static methods to check some inline conditions. When an assertion fails an AssertionException is throws.

Such a tool could be helpful for debugging.

Constructor Summary
Assert()

static void isFalse(boolean exp)
